snippet: Plants that light up the winter garden can be found at Broken Arrow Nursery in Connecticut, which has long been a favorite of gardening geeks.
abstract: Broken Arrow Nursery in Connecticut, known for its collection of rare trees and shrubs, offers a range of plants for the winter garden.
lead_paragraph: Plants that light up the winter garden can be found at Broken Arrow Nursery in Connecticut, which has long been a favorite of gardening geeks.

headline.print_headline: A Colorful Stroll Through the Winter
headline.seo: A Winter Stroll of Color — In the Garden
headline.main: A Colorful Stroll Through the Winter
